entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or ice pellets late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
